IMF’s revised Arrangement for Argentina is a strengthened economic plan aimed at bolstering confidence and stabilizing the economy, while maintaining a commitment to protecting social spending. Find out more: https://t.co/8CzIZ0SXGB https://t.co/JScPpiqI2Y

#Argentina’s revised plan will bolster confidence & stabilize the economy through a reduction in budget deficit, adoption of a simpler monetary policy framework, & freely floating the exchange rate. Prioritizing social assistance spending remains crucial. https://t.co/JayiDMu3aU https://t.co/Ei6YMbBLQJ

IMF Board completes first review of #Argentina’s loan and approves strengthened economic plan. Revised loan is augmented to US$56.3 billion and makes US$5.7 billion immediately available. https://t.co/Y364tLb5rZ
